definition: to hold a conversation/to talk over the telephone/phone call
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
Mandarin (common language)/Putonghua (common speech of the Chinese language)/ordinary speech
Putonghua Proficiency Test, an official test of spoken fluency in Standard Chinese for native speakers of Chinese languages, developed in the PRC in 1994
pinyin: Pu3 tong1 hua4 Shui3 ping2 Ce4 shi4

sentences.english: Mr. President, Condoleeza Rice is here to see you.
sentences.chinese: 总统先生，赖斯女士想和你通话。

sentences.english: This can directly affect your call quality and processing power of your server.
sentences.chinese: 这会直接影响你的通话质量和你的服务器的处理能力。

sentences.english: In addition, it encrypts all the calls to ensure that no one can listen to your saved conversations.
sentences.chinese: 而且别人无法听到这些经过加密的通话录音。

sentences.english: Many employers also check whether potential hires can speak Mandarin.
sentences.chinese: 许多用人单位也会核查应聘者是否会讲普通话。

sentences.english: He asked if Mr. Dimon could speak with Mr. Schwartz.
sentences.chinese: 他询问迪蒙能否与施瓦茨通话。

sentences.english: Hong Kong was suffering from a shortage of high-quality Putonghua teachers.
sentences.chinese: 香港缺乏高质素的普通话教师。

sentences.english: The compartment regulars between dialect and Mandrain are the important basis of dialect correctness.
sentences.chinese: 方言与普通话语音对应规律是方音辨正的重要依据。

sentences.english: Previously also speak Mandarin, Sichuan, guests hear the words, but also with soil any more.
sentences.chinese: 先前还讲普通话，听到客人是四川话，也用土话了。
每个人要戴着耳机才能通话。

sentences.english: Usually, teenagers only use their phone for texting, calling.
sentences.chinese: 通常，青少年只用手机来发短信，和通话。

sentences.english: The paper first gives a brief introduction to contrastive analysis and the characteristics of radiotelephony communication.
sentences.chinese: 文章首先介绍了对比分析与民航英语通话特点。

sentences.english: Locke's (Mandarin) Chinese family name is Luo.
sentences.chinese: 如果按照普通话，骆家辉的中国姓为骆。

sentences.english: Putonghua test is a kind of standard referential test.
sentences.chinese: 普通话水平测试属于标准参照性考试。

sentences.english: She asked if her dad had spoken to Ethan directly.
sentences.chinese: 她问爸爸有没有直接和伊森通话。

sentences.english: Then he comes back to talk to Lee again.
sentences.chinese: 一会儿他回来了又给李通话。

sentences.english: The minimum charge per month is HK$20.00.
sentences.chinese: 每月通话最低收费为港币20元正。

definition: to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection

incoming telegram or telephone call/your telegram, telephone call, or message/to send a telegram or make a telephone call here (i.e. to the speaker)/to have instant attraction to sb/to have chemistry with sb/to come back (of electricity, after an outage)
to talk (with sb)/to have a conversation/talk/conversation/CL:次[ci4]
to talk endlessly on the phone
